0.text: Innate: Nami's abilities grant  90 (+ 20% AP) bonus movement speed to allied  champions hit, decaying over 1.5 seconds. The bonus is「 doubled 」「 increased to 180 (+ 40% AP) 」from  Tidal Wave.
0.html: Innate: Nami's abilities grant  90 (+ 20% AP) bonus movement speed to allied champions hit, decaying over 1.5 seconds. The bonus is「 doubled 」「 increased to 180 (+ 40% AP) 」from Tidal Wave.
markedPassages: 90
champions
「 doubled 」「 increased to 180 (+ 40% AP) 」
「 increased to 180 (+ 40% AP) 」
Tidal Wave

0.text: Active: Nami launches a bubble at the target location that lands after 0.726 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies within as well as  revealing and  suspending them for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Nami launches a bubble at the target location that lands after 0.726 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies within as well as revealing and suspending them for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: after 0.726 seconds
revealing
suspending

1.text: Allied champions are granted  Surging Tides in a slightly larger area.
1.html: Allied champions are granted Surging Tides in a slightly larger area.
markedPassages: Surging Tides
possibleConcerningAbilities: Allied champions are granted  Surging Tides in a slightly larger area.

0.text: Active: Nami unleashes a stream of water onto the target champion or herself, which then bounces to nearby unaffected champions up to twice, alternating between enemies and allies and Nami.
0.html: Active: Nami unleashes a stream of water onto the target champion or herself, which then bounces to nearby unaffected champions up to twice, alternating between enemies and allies and Nami.

1.text: Ebb and Flow  heals allies and deals magic damage to enemies, with each bounce modifying the effectiveness of the next by -15% (+ 7.5% per 100 AP).
1.html: Ebb and Flow heals allies and deals magic damage to enemies, with each bounce modifying the effectiveness of the next by -15% (+ 7.5% per 100 AP).
markedPassages: heals

0.text: Active: Nami blesses herself or the target allied champion for 6 seconds, empowering the target's next 3 basic attacks or abilities to each deal bonus magic damage and  slow their target for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Nami blesses herself or the target allied champion for 6 seconds, empowering the target's next 3 basic attacks or abilities to each deal bonus magic damage and slow their target for 1 second.
markedPassages: slow

1.text: Empowered abilities that apply  area damage only deal 33% − 66% (based on level) of the bonus damage to non-champions.
1.html: Empowered abilities that apply area damage only deal 33% − 66% (based on level) of the bonus damage to non-champions.
markedPassages: area damage

0.text: Active: Nami surges a tidal wave in the target direction that grants  sight around its trajectory as it travels, dealing magic damage to enemies hit,  knocking them up for 0.5 seconds, and  slowing them for 2 − 4 (based on distance traveled) seconds.
0.html: Active: Nami surges a tidal wave in the target direction that grants sight around its trajectory as it travels, dealing magic damage to enemies hit, knocking them up for 0.5 seconds, and slowing them for 2 − 4 (based on distance traveled) seconds.
markedPassages: sight
knocking them up
slowing
